Replying to @DavidDarnes 2019-10-08 17:58
@DavidDarnes @markboulton @Netlify @eleven_ty Either really. But especially useful as either the quantity or size of the images rises. Git is not the perfect place for assets like that. They bloat your repo. Git LFS was designed to solve that and Netlify LM is a wrapper to simplify the use of that.
